results.name: Number of ways to tile a 4 X n room with 1x2 Tatami mats. At most 3 Tatami mats may meet at a point.
link: R. J. Mathar, Paving rectangular regions with rectangular tiles,...., arXiv:1311.6135 [math.CO], Table 3.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,1,0,1).
xref: Cf. A068929 for incongruent tilings, A068920 for more info. First column of A272473.
results.author: _Dean Hickerson_, Mar 11 2002
ext: G.f. proposed by Maksym Voznyy checked and corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 16 2009.
